summary:
Brett's Second Chance on ETH - Brett is one of the main characters in the webcomic 
Boys’ Club, which was created by Matt Furie in 2005. The webcomic gained popularity and eventually led to the creation of the character Pepe the Frog, who gained widespread internet fame. Many believe Pepe the Frog will become the biggest meme in the world, and Brett is his best friend.

  -
